H0.text: Type of soil used is the dependent variable in this experiment.

H1.text: Amount of water used is the dependent variable in this experiment.

H2.text: Length of sunlight exposure is the dependent variable in this experiment.

H3.text: Growth of the bean plants is the dependent variable in this experiment.

A4.text: soil fertility), the experiment can be controlled by assigning the treatments to randomly selected plots of land. This mitigates the effect of variations in soil composition on the yield.

A5.text: Controls eliminate alternate explanations of experimental results, especially experimental errors and experimenter bias.
